<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 72

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies (see text)

**Bulk**  varies (see text)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You can unfold this virtuoso percussion instrument into a hand drum (1 Bulk), a marching drum set with a shoulder harness and back brace (3 Bulk), or a large standing drum set with a built-in stool (16 Bulk). Changing the folding drum's size is a 3-action Interact activity, and the drums must have sufficient open space to accommodate their new size.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You play a pounding rhythm on the drum. If the next action you use is to cast a [composition](/Traits.aspx?ID=31) cantrip that has an emanation, increase the area of the emanation by 30 feet.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
